job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

cases and errorsEnsure highest quality of deliverables by following architecture/design guidelines, coding best practices, periodic design/code reviewsWrite unit tests as well as higher level tests to handle expected edge cases and errors gracefully, as well as happy pathsUses bug tracking, code review, version control and other tools to organize and deliver workParticipate in scrum calls and agile ceremonies, and effectively communicate work progress, issues and dependenciesConsistently contribute in researching & evaluating latest architecture patterns/technologies through rapid learning,
